question: Provide PMIDs supporting that ERBB3 Overexpression confers sensitivity to Selumetinib.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'ERBB3 Overexpression'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Selumetinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selumetinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'RIT1 Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Selumetinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selumetinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Cite PMIDs showing PIK3CA H1047R OR PIK3CA H1047Y OR PIK3CA H1047L OR PIK3CA H1047D OR PIK3CA H1047I OR PIK3CA H1047N OR PIK3CA H1047P OR PIK3CA H1047Q OR PIK3CA H1047T predicts sensitivity to Palbociclib.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'PIK3CA H1047R OR PIK3CA H1047Y OR PIK3CA H1047L OR PIK3CA H1047D OR PIK3CA H1047I OR PIK3CA H1047N OR PIK3CA H1047P OR PIK3CA H1047Q OR PIK3CA H1047T'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Palbociclib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Palbociclib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Palbociclib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cetuximab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cetuximab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cetuximab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'MTOR E2014K AND MTOR E2419K'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Everolimus')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Everolimus'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Everolimus')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'CTNNB1 T41A'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Meloxicam')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Meloxicam'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Meloxicam')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What PubMed IDs support sensitivity of Sorafenib due to KIT Exon 11 Mutation OR KIT Exon 9 Mutation OR PDGFRA Exon 18 Mutation?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'KIT Exon 11 Mutation OR KIT Exon 9 Mutation OR PDGFRA Exon 18 Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sorafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sorafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sorafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'FLT3 N841I'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Quizartinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Quizartinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Quizartinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What PubMed IDs support sensitivity of Dasatinib due to BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 E453K?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 E453K'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
